items.sentence: I don't think that you need that much money to buy what you need.
I met her at the station, but I did not recognize her in uniform.
Seen at a distance, the rock looks like a squatting human figure.
Although Tom and Mary are twins, they don't look very much alike.
They just need the job to be done. It doesn't matter who does it.
Tom knew he didn't have enough time to do what needed to be done.
Tom didn't have enough time to do everything that had to be done.
Tom knew he barely had enough money to buy what he wanted to buy.
I usually don't peel apples before eating them. I just wash them.
The number of murders is increasing even in a country like Japan.
